tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterAndSanitation (
  region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  water_source VARCHAR(100),
  water_usage DECIMAL,
  sanitation_practices VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Area VARCHAR(255),
  UsageType VARCHAR(255),
  UsageAmount INT,
  RecordedAt TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SanitationPractices (
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Area VARCHAR(255),
  PracticeType VARCHAR(255),
  PracticeDetail TEXT,
  RecordedAt TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE WaterUsage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    household_id INT,
    water_consumption FLOAT,
    water_source VARCHAR(50),
    date_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SanitationPractices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    household_id INT,
    waste_disposal VARCHAR(50),
    toilet_facilities BOOLEAN,
    hygiene_practices VARCHAR(100),
    date_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE HealthImpact (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    household_id INT,
    water_related_illness BOOLEAN,
    sanitation_related_illness BOOLEAN,
    impact_description TEXT,
    date_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyData (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   location VARCHAR(50),
   survey_date DATE,
   responder_name VARCHAR(50),
   feedback TEXT
);
